scripts.start-sandbox: docker run --rm --name taia-x-sandbox --detach -p 20000:20000 -e block_time=3 tqtezos/flextesa:20210514 flobox start
scripts.compile: docker run --rm --platform linux/amd64 -v `$PWD`:`$PWD` -w `$PWD` ligolang/ligo:0.32.0 compile contract contracts/src/taia_x_main.mligo --entry-point main -o contracts/out/taia_x_main.tz
